name: A lost world - J-RPG
description:
Hello and thanks for playing. As you can see, this is unfortunately just a trial version but I am working on this game and maybe I will publish some news for the start of the game on this site! I am a german programmer but this game was not fully programmed. I have used a tool. The so-called RPGMaker some would have to connect something with this name! For some bugs please say it. This is the basic framework for the main game

Languages:

English

German (Deutsch)

Infos to the Main Game:

The main project has been canceled but I have a few SpinOfs in planning!

Marvolousga.com

I would like to thank marvolousga.com. They have raked this game, it has received lots of attention. <3

<3
